contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Ropesville, Texas | native_name = | settlement_type = Community | image_skyline = Ropesville_Texas_grain_elevator_2011.jpg | image_alt = Grain elevator in Ropesville | image_caption = [[Grain elevator]] in Ropesville | map_caption = | pushpin_map = Texas | pushpin_relief = yes | pushpin_label = Ropesville | pushpin_label_position = right | pushpin_map_alt = Map of Texas | pushpin_map_caption = | latd = 33 |latm = 24 |lats = 48 |latNS = N | longd = 102 |longm = 09 |longs = 16 |longEW = W | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_type = | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = {{flag|United States}} | subdivision_type1 = State | subdivision_name1 = {{flag|Texas}} | subdivision_type2 = County | subdivision_name2 = [[Hockley County, Texas| Hockley]] | subdivision_type3 = Region | subdivision_name3 = [[Llano Estacado]] | established_title = Established | established_date = 1917 | founder = | unit_pref = US | elevation_footnotes =<ref name=gnis>{{cite gnis|id=1366856|name= Ropesville}}</ref> | elevation_ft = 3363 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 517 | population_as_of = [[United States Census, 2000|2000]] | timezone1 = [[North American Central Time Zone|CST]] | utc_offset1 = -6 | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = [[ZIP code]] | postal_code = 79358 | area_code_type = Area code | area_code = [[Area code 806|806]] | website = {{URL|www.tshaonline.org/handbook/online/articles/hlr38|Handbook of Texas: Ropesville}} | footnotes = }} '''Ropesville''' is a city in [[Hockley County, Texas|Hockley County]], [[Texas]], [[United States]]. The population was 517 at the [[2000 United States Census|2000 census]]. ==Geography== Ropesville is located on the high plains of the [[Llano Estacado]] at {{coord|33|24|48|N|102|09|16|W|type:city}} (33.4134229 -102.1543406){{GR|1}}. According to the [[United States Census Bureau]], the city has a total area of {{convert|0.4|sqmi|km2}}, all of it land. ==Demographics== As of the [[census]]{{GR|2}} of 2000, there were 517 people, 177 households, and 141 families residing in the city. The [[population density]] was 1,441.5 people per square mile (554.5/km²). There were 185 housing units at an average density of 515.8 per square mile (198.4/km²). The racial makeup of the city was 87.43% [[White (U.S. Census)|White]], 2.13% [[African American (U.S. Census)|African American]], 0.97% [[Native American (U.S. Census)|Native American]], 6.00% from [[Race (United States Census)|other races]], and 3.48% from two or more races. [[Hispanic (U.S. Census)|Hispanic]] or [[Latino (U.S. Census)|Latino]] of any race were 53.19% of the population. There were 177 households out of which 43.5% had children under the age of 18 living with them, 64.4% were [[Marriage|married couples]] living together, 7.9% had a female householder with no husband present, and 19.8% were non-families. 18.6% of all households were made up of individuals and 9.6% had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 2.92 and the average family size was 3.32. In the city the population was spread out with 33.3% under the age of 18, 8.1% from 18 to 24, 26.1% from 25 to 44, 20.9% from 45 to 64, and 11.6% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 33 years. For every 100 females there were 101.2 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 96.0 males. The median income for a household in the city was $29,531, and the median income for a family was $31,250. Males had a median income of $21,176 versus $18,393 for females. The [[per capita income]] for the city was $16,670. About 14.7% of families and 14.6% of the population were below the [[poverty line]], including 19.2% of those under age 18 and 16.4% of those age 65 or over. ==Education== The City of Ropesville is served by the [[Ropes Independent School District]]. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.tshaonline.org/handbook/online/articles/hlr38 Handbook of Texas: Ropesville, TX] *[https://sites.google.com/site/photosbyleaflet/home/photos-of-the-llano-estacado Photos of the Llano Estacado] {{-}} {{Hockley County, Texas}} [[Category:Populated places in Hockley County, Texas]] [[Category:Cities in Texas]]
